headline: Andrew Rashbass, Reuters Chief, Is Moving to Euromoney
abstract: He is leaving the company after less than two years and will be replaced on an interim basis by Stephen Adler, president and editor in chief of Reuters.

headline: Despite Federal Regulation, C.E.O.-Worker Pay Gap Data Remains Hidden
abstract: An analysis of recent company reports, however, finds that the widest gap exists between the chief executives and workers of Disney, Oracle, Qualcomm and Starbucks.

headline: Word of Oil Find Near Gatwick Excites Britain
abstract: While UK Oil and Gas executives were enthusiastic, energy experts were more skeptical about the potential of the find.
